contentrichtext.text: {{See also|Robur (disambiguation)}} In [[Gallo-Roman religion]], '''Robor''' or '''Roboris''' was a god invoked alongside the ''[[genius loci]]'' on a single inscription found in [[Angoulême]].<ref>Nicole Jufer & Thierry Luginbühl (2001). ''Les dieux gaulois : répertoire des noms de divinités celtiques connus par l'épigraphie, les textes antiques et la toponymie.'' Paris: Editions Errance. ISBN 2-87772-200-7.</ref> ==External links== * [http://www.celtnet.org.uk/gods_r/robur.html Robur in celtnet] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Celtic mythology (ancient)}} [[Category:Gaulish gods]] [[Category:Nature gods]] {{Celt-myth-stub}}
